LanguageData.ABF_EnergyNeedDesc: Energy is the amount of retained charge in the unit. If it is hits zero, the unit will enter an inefficient low-power mode. If charge is not restored, hardware will eventually critically malfunction, and the unit will cease functioning.
LanguageData.ABF_DirectiveDefAbilities: This directive gives the following abilities: {0}
LanguageData.ABF_DirectiveDefHediff: This directive is associated with the {0} hediff
